:
   Says if you are on your bike in a crosswalk, all you have to do is dip
   your wheel into the road and cars must legally stop.

true true
     * Oregon

   By Ian K. Kullgren January 11, 2013

Must cars stop if a cyclist dips a wheel into a crosswalk?

Maus tweeted that the new law meant a cyclist could dip a tire into a
   crosswalk and cars would legally have to stop to permit crossing.

half-true half-true
